description.oldValue:
,Workspace Management is a new feature within Teams Admin Center that provides an integrated view of Teams devices and peripherals based on their location, along with relevant insights. This capability provides IT admins the ability to manage connected devices, and monitor workspace health, utilization and conformance to standards at any location.
GA date: April CY2023
Preview date: March CY2023
description.newValue:
,Workspace Management is a new feature within Teams Admin
     Center that provides an integrated view of Teams devices and peripherals
     based on their location, along with relevant insights. This capability provides
     IT admins the ability to manage connected devices, and monitor workspace
     health, utilization and conformance to standards at any location.
